content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'ft_NotificationDetails_copy' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'STG_Minecare')
CREATE TABLE STG_Minecare.ft_NotificationDetails_copy
	(
	 [NotificationID] bigint,
	 [SiteId] int,
	 [EventId] bigint,
	 [id_Model] int,
	 [id_Equipment] int,
	 [GroupId] int,
	 [id_OemEvent] int,
	 [id_interface] int,
	 [Level] int,
	 [NLevel] int,
	 [ReadTime] datetime2(7),
	 [OperatorId] nvarchar(4000),
	 [GPSLocation] nvarchar(4000),
	 [UpdateDate] datetime2(7),
	 [InsertDate] datetime2(7)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_ft_NotificationDetails_copy
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO STG_Minecare.ft_NotificationDetails_copy
(NotificationID 1, SiteId 2, EventId 3, id_Model 4, id_Equipment 5, GroupId 6, id_OemEvent 7, id_interface 8, Level 9, NLevel 10, ReadTime 11, OperatorId 12, GPSLocation 13, UpdateDate 14, InsertDate 15)
FROM 'https://devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/devproc/DataMultidim/minecare/delta/ft_NotificationDetails'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM STG_Minecare.ft_NotificationDetails_copy
GO
